interestingcomments.content: Is Nutrient Water Bad for Submersible Water Pumps? /!/ I just recently made a vertical garden that stands in a corner of my room, I also purchased tubing along with a submersible water pump to get water to my plants through 3D printed sprayers. I purchased some "Burpee Organic All Purpose Water Soluble Plant Food" to give my plants a little more nutrients. I'm wondering if it is still safe to use the submersible pump, or if the impellers will get calcified if it sits in the solution for too long. Thanks!
